reviews.review:
안타까운 게임... 
GTA5, The Last of Us와 같은 해에 출시되지 않았다면 최다 GOTY도 받을 수 있었을텐데
This game. A million times this game.

My first Bioshock, and all I can say is: Damn good!  The graphics are nice. Colorful and vibrant. The story is amazing. I really enjoyed every part of the game. Not to mention the ending. I will spoil nothing but I can't wait for more.
Bioshock  Infinite is the game that will change the way you think about games.
This game kicks ass. Incredible story Btw.
this game is mind-blowing, graphics are excellent, and the game mechanics work smoothly. To pass this game up would be a mistake. So go out and get already.

Normally, this is the part where I put "if you like X type of games, play this game."

If you like games at all, play this game.
Phenomenal gameplay. Cool fighting mechanics. Engaging characters. Inception.

Buen juego. Mantiene como mecánica el uso de armas, plasmids (acá los llaman tonics o vigors) y habilidades pasivas de los otros Bioshock, pero le agrega dos elementos nuevos al combate. Eso si, en este te limitan la cantidad de armas que puedes llevar a la vez.

Estéticamente es bonito, aunque me gustaba más al ambiente cincuentero lúgubre de Rapture (la estética moderna de los 50 y 60 es mi favorita) al de la colorida Columbia (la ciudad del juego ambientada en 1912).

Respecto a la historia, igual es entretenida y uno se arma una gran cantidad de teorías a medida que avanza el juego. No hay múltiples finales a diferencia del otro, pero al terminarlo uno puede buscar en google una explicación y hacen notar todos los detalles que lo dejan a uno satisfecho con que haya solo uno.

Recomiendo jugar el 1 igual antes. Primero porque es un muy buen juego y segundo porque igual se pueden hacer algunas analogías entre ambos juegos. Eso si, no es necesario (pero lo recomiendo).
It's really good, as long as you are not looking for a CoD 87365536773890

Those ratings don't lie. Bioshock Infinite is sublime in every way. It will leave you in awe with it's visuals/graphics, characters, detailed, immersive, and thought provoking storyline. Gameplay is exhilarating with the perfect amount of horror. Definitely one of the or even 'the' best game I have ever played. Infinite is an unforgettable experience that will leave you floored.
10/10

BioShock Infinite is the quintessential video game for plot and character development. It is an unforgettable experience; establishing a rich and interesting backdrop in which a single masterfully-told fiction unfolds. Every aspect of the game mirrors this exemplary quality, bar the lack of challenge due to its forgiving respawn system. Every gamer should experience BioShock Infinite as it is one of the best games of the current generation.

Awesome story, awesome characters, BEAUTIFUL environments, and the combat works but isnt the games strongest point, the spells/vigors are creative and there is a nice variety of weapons. This game is a refreshing and well done FPS that breathes a bit of life into the big name video game industry, you can tell these guys worked hard on the game and it pays off.
Best game I've ever played in my entire life.

Von der Spielmechanik her ist Bioshock ein durchschnittlicher Shooter mit einigen nervigen Zwischengegnern. Außergewöhnlich wird das Spiel aber durch das detaillierte Design der Spielwelt, dass den Beginn des 20. Jahrhunderts lebendig werden lässt. Dazu gehören auch die Schattenseiten wie religiöser Fanatismus, Klassenunterschiede, Rassismus, Ausbeutung der Arbeiter oder Indoktrination der Kinder, die ganz nebenbei mit Thematisiert werden.

Und dann ist da natürlich die komplexe, mitreißende Story mit zwei tollen und vielschichtigen Hauptfiguren. Teilweise wünschte ich mir, dass der jeweilige Level schneller zu Ende gehen würde, damit man endlich erfährt, wie es weitergeht :)
Dat game!
Bloody, touching, engaging, addictive, Unforgettable. Best game I ever played.

I can't remember a single other game that once I'd played through and completed it, I restarted the game to play it over again from the beginning.

I did with this game!

Sheer quality.

Truly, truly amazing!

Don't even hesitate to buy it. It's good looking, well paced and has the best story telling in a game I've ever seen.

Enjoy.
Excellent! Definitely Game of the Year 2013.

Many will disagree, but I think BioShock Infinite's combat is far, far better than the original game's. I also really enjoyed the game's story. It could have placed a greater emphasis on the problems with Columbia from a writing and a greater emphasis on exploration from a gameplay one, but this is a great game.

Given the success of Bioshock 1 and 2,  Irrational Games and 2K Marin had a lot to live up to when they announced the release of Bioshock Infinite, and they certainly delivered.  Like the previous Bioshocks, the player is enriched with breathtaking visuals right at the start, and the vivid imagery continues throughout the game.  The developers must have had authors to create the story.  The character and story development is superb.  And, although the story is a damsel in distress cliché, never before have I played a game that makes you genuinely care for the damsel.  The connection to the characters is authentic and emotive.   Infinite is the magnum opus of the series.  This game can honestly be considered a great work of literature.
GOTY 2013
Beautiful game in almost every way.  The storyline is simply magnificent and guarenteed to keep your attention thee entire playthrough.
If you do not already own this game.  You need to own this game.
Goddamn masterpiece. I have nothing funny to say, you should get this.

Honestly, kind of disappointing game.

To start off with strengths, the visuals are amazing. This game is very colorful and aesthetically pleasing. You could randomly press your screenshot button throughout this game and have a very nice collection of wall papers (assuming you first disable the HUD). 

The bad: the gameplay is as deep as an August shower's puddle. Very shallow. All upgrades are through money. The upgrade system is very uninteresting; primarily just damage buffs, reload speed increases for your guns or slight modifcations to vigors.

The combat gets pretty stale. Use your guns and vigors to kill the bad guys in the arena then move on.  Occasionally fight a bullet sponge or two. There's no real need to diversify or change up your tactics.

There are some poorly implemented features. Ammo gets scarce in some places. Lockpicks are rare as hell early game then suddenly late game you are swimming in lockpicks. Vigor upgrades are very expensive relative to gun upgrades which discourages their usage. After arguing with the protagonist or killing someone, a request to open a lock by the main character is met with a sprightly 'I'm on it' from Elizabeth. Sprightly as she was in the beginning despite the fact that her tone should reflect current emotional happenings. Really immersion breaking.

The story is ridiculous, putting it mildly. Stories should not need deep inspection of minor details of the plot to figure out what the fuck is happening and why. Inception was great. This, not so much. Fails pretty hard in this regard. Even if you do have all the details, explanations for things such as the Hummingbird are lacking or tenuously implied.

There is very little subtlety in this game. It comes off as a little preachy at times. Essentially the idea behind this game is 'Hey you! Nationalism and racism is bad! Did you get that? Racism bad! Segregation bad! Industrial management bad! Here's an example of their wrongdoing! Did you get that?'. There's no nuance in any of the ideas presented. It almost comes off like propaganda. Like the gameplay, the ideas are very shallow. 

Is this a 10/10 game? Hell no. The plot is obtuse, the gameplay CoD-esque, RPG elements really lacking. Just goes to show to never trust reviewers and never trust their numbers. The numbers that really matter are the numbers that line their pockets.
TIN MAN, TIN MAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAN
This game was great, from start to finish. Sticks with being a BioShock game and the BioShock feeling. A great ending, just overall great. I love it.

Excelente juegos, excelente el trabajo artistico y grafico del juego con un maga gigantesco super detallado y cada rincon de columbia ademas con una muy buena optimisación.

Una historia espectacular muy bien narrada supero mis espectativas, se merece el nombre Bioshock este juego sin dudas mantiene la mecanica de los dos anteriores

Simplemente una obra maestra, con una muy buena ambientacion e historia bastante interesante, a pesar de no haber jugado a las dlc's igualmente me senti completo.

Вот просто нет слов! Это лучшая игра, пройденная мной за последнее время, 10 из 10.
С нетерпением жду выхода DLC, для того чтобы снова окунуться с головой в этот мир!

DLC Bioshock infinite: burial at sea ВЕЛИКОЛЕПНО!
Концовка не хуже чем в оригинальной игре. 
Да, очень мало контента + очень легко проходиться на 1999 уровне сложности, но сюжет и атмосфера просто супер.

One of the best games I have played in a long time. Who wouldn't want to machine gun while simultaneously throwing fire balls out of your hand.There are various different powers and guns to play with which can also be upgraded to have different effects. 
Awesome graphics, very immersive and the story is just amazing. Something you must experience yourself to understand how good it is. I would say its worth every penny of the full retail price, also very well optimized for PC. Will most definitely be my GOTY. 10/10

Amazing Game, having Elizabeth around is useful. If you liked Bioshock you have to play this too, the original has the upper hand but there are very few games that can even come close to this standard, the though and effort that's gone into it is truely mind blowing. Not a particularly long game but at about 4  years to produce 12 odd hrs gameplay  it's more than a reasonable content. 

Ranks about third (out of prob 1000's) of the best games I've played in the last 35 yrs
A truly awesome game, with an amazing storyline. Bioshock Infinite is hands down one of the best game I have ever played. 10/10

Fantastic story, great characters, an interesting setting, and amusing gameplay. Played it once through, turned around, and played it a second time. Very, very few games have I played twice through, and I already am tempted to give it a third go.

The world really comes alive, and while not as dark as the other Bioshocks, it does keep the spirit of the games alive.

The Bioshock series has always been a cut above the rest when it comes to single player First Person shooters, Infinite being no exception and in fact this itineration is the best out of the three i'd have to say. Bioshock trademarks are all there of course: Kickass graphics, smooth, bugfree gameplay (at least in my experience) and best of all, a brain cracking, superior, lovingly told story set in a city in the clouds. The ending is still bleeding my brain a day after ive finished the game and im sure it will for a while yet, its that good. A solid 5/5 in my books and should take game of the year hands down.

This is a game of immense beauty and unrelenting savagery. It will lead you from awe inspiring vistas to heart pounding combat. The story will keep you guessing and the voice acting is second to none. Elizabeth is one of the most beautiful and well designed companions I have ever come across in a video game. I really do not want this game to end.

Могу сказать только одно - это гребанный шедевр. Атмосфера, сюжет, геймплей - главная черта игры. Особенно атмосфера. Сюжет очень запутан, но немного поразмышляв, все это сплетается во единое целое. 10/10, и говорить тут нечего. Сделали не только отличный экшен, но и пищу для мозгов!

Brilliant story, brilliant characters, brilliant world.
123 from 100 ;)
Best ending ever.

This game blew me away, and left a pretty big mark. Ticks all of my boxes: It's a technical, mechanical, and storytelling masterpiece. The plot twist dropped my jaw and sent shivers down my spine, with an ending that left me sitting in front of my monitor for a moment piecing together just what the hell happened. As is normal in the BioShock series, battles can be fought a number of ways, be it through the use of your environment, vigors, or good old fashioned bullets. Or all three! Columbia is full of life and designed with purpose. Every set piece pulls you into the experience. I spent hours just walking around admiring the detail with which this game was made. And this game is gorgeous. But screenshots don't do it justice. You really need to play this game to experience the sense of awe you get from walking around a living, breathing, floating slice of elitist 1912 America. Buy it. Seriously.
Mind blowing game.

Плюсы
1.Элизабет от которой реально помогает,
ну и еще она красивая (спасибо Анне Молевой)
2.Захватывающий сюжет,
которой держит в напряжение до конца
3.Много оружия
4.Великоепная атмосфера небесного города
5.Хорошая музыка
6.Внимательность к деталям
Минусы
1.Слабый ИИ
2.Не хватает русской локализации
Моя оценка 10.PS Лучшая игра  в жанре шутеров, от 1 лица.
И просто Великолепная игра последних лет
Играйте с удовольствием и для удовольствия 
PS. Подписываемся на канал https://www.youtube.com/user/CptFoxRus/videos и будут видео обзоры (наверно), но все равно подписываемся

This game has it all! A great story, rpg elements, nice graphics, fun game play and Elizabeth! Vigors aka plasmids add replayability since you cannot upgrade all of them to the fullest in a playthru. Infusions are used to upgrade your health, shield or salts (mp), they're also limited in numbers so choose wisely.

The ending of this game will blow you away. You'll definitely want to replay it just to make it all sink in and understand all the subtle elements of the story you get during the progress of the game. There a some small glitches here and there but nothing game breaking.

This the kind of game that leaves an impression on you. You'll never forget it.
Best game I have ever played. 5/5

Bioshock Infinite far surpassed my expectations. While it is immediately apparent that it's the most visually stunning game of all time, to direct similar praise to the game itself takes a while longer. But at this point I can say with confidence that this is, BY FAR, the best single player FPS game of all time, standing far above the likes of Call of Duty and Half-Life. It's also worth noting that I never bothered finishing the first two games, but this one just keeps getting better and better.

Искусство. С душой.

10 / 10
Absolutely epic

Would you kindly buy this game and then buy me a game as a thank you for recommending such aan amazing one!
The Polar opposite beliefs of the foundations of Rapture (Bioshock 1) are what the floating City of Columbia are built upon. I am not sure a great Author could weave a story any better. It all starts with a light house.
BEST GAME THIS DECADE
Simply awesome ... that is all :-D

how fraking amazing this game :DD 11|10

After few years i think this is the best game
one of the best FPS games ever
A unforgettable experience, with marvelous gameplay and a fanstastic and incredible storyline. Truely never seen anything quite like it before.

Ein geniales Game (wie jedes Spiel dieser Reihe bisher). Zwar geht die Grund Idee in die genau entgegengesetzte Richtung, das Spielprinzip bleibt jedoch gleich. Zum Ende hin sind Überraschungen mit dabei (wirklich total unerwartet und es zaubert einem durchaus ein Lächeln auf die Lippen) und der totale Mindfuck darf auch nicht fehlen^^. Ein Muss für jeden Bioshock-liebhaber oder für jene die es werden wollen. 10\10 Punkten.
Excellent-issime !

What a game! Must have!!

The gunplay, the powers and everything about the game just oozes awesomeness but the greatest thing of all is the story. I'd go into detail but I really don't wanna ruin it so stop reading this, get your money out and enjoy!

Well recommended.

The game I have been most hyped about this year so far. This game as an awesome story, a lot of epic action and is very creative, for example the idea of Columbia the Floating city in the sky ,which makes it different from any other game I have played. The story of the game itself makes you think about various different things such as how every decision changes the world of columbia and that you also get to witness different versions of Columbia which could have been.


I think it deserves the 10/10 or 9/10 it got on the reviews as it is an awesome game and I recommend this to everyone as it is worth playing. :)
Rly awesome game, recommended for all:)
Так и нужно рассказывать истории!
One of the most graphically advanced girlfriend simulators on the market.
Best in the series yet!
best game ever, highly recommend it!
Mind Fuck

Потрясающий мир! Потрясающий сюжет! И плевать, что шутер это средний.
P. S. Не пропускайте финальные титры ;-)

Игра получилась просто великолепной, разнообразной и запоминающейся, с глубоким, сложным сюжетом, с интересными поворотами, с тонкой проработкой самых мелких деталей, с бесподобной и неповторимой атмосферой Америки тех лет. Cтоль щепетильное отношение к дизайну просто поражает: музыка, улочки, костюмы, плакаты, архитектура. Куда не глянь, рука так и тянется сделать скриншот, так хороша картинка. Игра по праву заслуживает называться произведением искусства. В неё погружаешься, а скорее возносишься так, что порой кажется, если вдохнуть поглубже, можно даже почувствовать каков на вкус воздух Колумбии…

Ein Grossartiges Spiel, dass sich jeder holen sollte! Gameplay ist wie in den ersten beide Bioshock absolut fantastisch, wo sogar noch einige Komponente hinzukommen, wie zum Beispiel die Sky Lines. Grafik ist super und die deutsche Synchronisation hat auch einen guten Job gemacht. Über den Schluss muss ich immer noch nachdenken, weil der einfach so krass ist. Ein Must-Have!

This game will easily take 2013 Game of the Year. The story was equal to or better than the first game (3 >= 1 > 2). Cash powers everything in this game (upgrades / ammo / etc).  I'm kind of on the wall about the removal of the separate money system for upgrades (i.e. ADAM) like the first two games had.. The only negative I can think of is that the game only allows checkpoint saves so you really can't pick up and leave off wherever you feel like it.

Buy. This. Game. Now....no seriously. I'll wait. 

Oh, you haven’t bought it yet? And you want a (average) review on it? Alright then, here it goes. This is a masterpiece. People are relating it to Half Life 2, and Uncharted based on how good it is. It currently holds a meta critic score of 96/100 which is almost unseen of. The graphics and visuals in this game are absolutely stunning. You can easily get lost in this game's atmosphere looking for money, looting every corner of every place you visit, listening to the conversations between NPCs, reading the extremely well-designed advertisements located on walls, posters etc... I can go on all day. The amount of love and craftsmanship that went into this excellent piece of work is jaw-dropping. If you have the chance play this game on Ultra Settings, the graphics are almost better than life, its that good. Take the time to look at the detail on your weapon, or a poster on a wall, and I assure you, you WILL NOT see any sort of distortion or pixels (except when zooming in with a sniper). That my friends, is how detailed the world is. The gameplay pretty decent honestly, but nothing to special. You have your standard FPS gameplay, shooting your weapons, blowing off enemies’ heads and what not, but also has its own twist. Similar to the old bioshock titles, you can equip and weapon in one hand while casting lightening spells at your enemies with the other, or perhaps sending a flock of crows to eat away at your enemies flesh as you gun him down. The story as you progress is very good. You start to form a relationship with the character Elizabeth as she aids you throughout the game (also her character design is awesome, like something out of a Pixar movie). Toward the end of Bioshock Infinite the story starts to go full circle. But without spoiling, I did scratch my head for a good 5 minutes toward the last 30 seconds of the game, trying to figure out what just happened. But once I figured this interestingly beautiful (in an odd way) ending, I was satisfied. Sadly thought this game took me about 8 hours to complete on Medium, which is quite decent. I also play a lot of FPS games so there wasn’t much challenge for me. But next time I get the chance I will be doing a Hard run, just to give myself a bit more of a challenge, and to relive the atmosphere.
Turn off all the lights in your room, put on some high quality headphones, turn the graphics on Ultra (if you can), and strap in because Bioshock Infinite, is easily going to take hours of your life away, as you explore this beautiful and extremely detailed world. 
Bioshock Infinite easily earns a 9 / 10.

The most incredible game I've played in a very long time. Bioshock Infinite is the best possible scenario: a game that you know is going to be good, but that still manages to exceed your expectations. Action, story, enviornment, graphics, gameplay... it is totally engrossing and is the first game in awhile that is worth every penny of the $59.99 price tag. Top to bottom, simply brilliant - do yourself a favor and BUY THIS GAME!
Beautiful art design and an amazing ending that makes the game worth playing twice.

An excllent game, and instantly captivated my attention from the start. This game is very well optimized, has an amazing story, and also retains a lot of elements from Bioshock 1. Even if you're not a fan of the Bioshock franchise, this game might spark an interest for you.

Beautiful, captivating experience. Highly recommended for anyone who loves an an amazing story and enjoys an immersive enviornment with a complex combat system that always has you thinking. Don't forget 1999 mode!

Apesar de ter Bioshock no título, este não tem nenhuma relação direta com o mundo do primeiro jogo. As semelhaças ficam apenas no título, em algumas características da jogabilidade e como a história é contada. 
Infinite se passa, também, em uma cidade utópica, porém aqui você não chega após tudo ter ido por água abaixo, como em Bioshock, mas sim antes e durante todo o processo. Seu personagem é enviado para Columbia, a cidade nos céus, para resgatar uma garota e saudar suas dívidas em apostas de corrida. A história sendo o ponto alto deste jogo, ganha grande destaque e força com a adição da personagem Elizabeth, a garota que é resgatada te segue para todos os lados te trazendo mais próximo deste mundo e seus acontecimentos, já que seu personagem está sempre interagindo com ela. 
A grande adição ao combate foi a Sky Line, uma espécie de montanha russa que pode ser usada para se locomover com facilidade pelo cenário e ganhar vantagem durante as batalhas, porém elas só existem em ambientes a céu aberto e apenas em alguns segmentos dos cenários. Outra novidade é que Elizabeth pode te ajudar entregando munição e usando seu poder para alterar o mapa em seu benefício, criando barreiras, caixas com medicamentos ou até mesmo turrets.
Apesar da história e da ambientação serem muito boas, o combate perdeu muito potencial em relação ao primeiro Bioshock, mesmo assim o jogo é muito bom.
get
Best story-driven game I have ever played. Period.
The best story I've ever seen in a game, and I've played a few.

El primer Bioshock se me hizo interesante, pero siento que tenia un combate muy aburrido, porque sentia que las armas no hacian daño. En este Bioshock, las armas se sienten poderosas y tus habilidades tambien, lo disfrute mucho mas.
Holy Ballsack nuts in my face this shit is so mind-shatteringly amazing. If you do not have this yet, you might as well kill yourself right now.

I do not know what I was expecting of this game, but my dear, sweat, fell god, this game is awesome.  The delays they had for this game apparently meant they were doing honest work on the thing as it is not only beautiful, but engaging.  It has been years since I have forked the cash over for a game - much less a sequel - and expected anything but a half-assed effort.  

That being said, I have found this game easier to play with a controller. As one of the few games with the full support for it, it would seem the game was designed with it in mind.  Furthermore, contrary to what that tool from PC Gamer said, upping the difficulty may break the game feel since it introduces possible glaring breaks in what is otherwise a smooth narrative. 

I can ramble endlessly, but not only does it make my recommendation boring, it may also give away what is fast becoming one of my favourite stories.  DO IT, MAN.  PULL THE TRIGGER. BUY THIS MOTHERFUCKER!
Mr DeWitt is a pimp
One of the best games I have ever played
Good game yo

Mind-blowing shooter! One of the best games I have ever played in the last years. Highly recommended! I am thrilled that I pre-ordered this game just a few days before it was launched and got some bonuses and the XCOM: Enemy Unknown game too. You will not regret buying this! The game itself and the its story are fantastic! I already finished it and I am excited about the coming DLC's (got the Season Pass).
Quantum Mechanics + Art Nouveau + Political Theory + Buddhism + Pew Pew + Whoosh

I have played quite a huge number of "ego shooters with a story" in the last few years, but none -- none! -- have made even half of the impression on me that Bioshock Infinite did. First I was enthralled by the rich details of the city in the sky, Columbia. Then I was in love with Elizabeth, the greatest "female sidekick" character since HL2, heck, even better. Then, finally, I was in awe and utter shock (positively) of the final half hour, where the story ties its knots, questions are answered and one "holy sh*t" reveal follows after another. Some shooters are forgotten immediately after they ended -- I will never forget this one. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
Yeah.  This game was fantastic.  The environments are gorgeous, the characters are enjoyable, and the story was phenominal.  You should own this.

Putting aside the handymen, which are, basically, the developer's way of screwing player on harder difficulties; and the fact that one of the selling points of the game is how hot you find Elizabeth, it's somewhat decent compared to most recent releases... but not by a lot, this game is extremely overrated for what it is.

However, creativity and quality wise, it's a step back from the first Bioshock.

I do still recommend it, but it's pretty generic regardless.

It's fun to play, but wouldn't get my panty hose in a knot over it. It is fairly linear, a real no-brainer and while I get the story, it's not really my thing. Your tag along pal is never targeted so you never have to worry about her, and she serves as more of get-out-of-jail-free mate when you screw up; she also prevents you from having to go through earlier areas of the map when she saves your ass. This game has three rinse-and-repeat bosses (Iam not a fan of boss battles) and the final battle is involved and challenging, yet much of the AI tends to stand still while you plug away at it. It's more like a shooting gallery on steroids. I found myself looking for it to end around the Comstock House. I played it on Hard, maxed everything out, averaged 74fps on the benchmark. Recommend waiting for it to go for 30 bucks before buying.

Have you played any other Bioshock? 
If yes then buy this one it wraps everything in an amazing ending. 
If you have not played Bioshock 1 or 2 the games story will make no sense but the gunplay is some of the best out there.
Absolutely amazing. You should buy this.
Metaphysics and fantastical violence come to Disneyland
This game is absolutely amazing. From the graphics, to the gameplay, to the story, it was just fantastic. I definitely recommend this game.

Bioshock 1 was already one of my favourite games, but Bioshock Infinite has pushed the entire Bioshock Universe(s) into my top slot for the best game series of ALL TIME. Stunningly beautiful, detailed and atmospheric worlds smothered in intriguing and mysterious storylines and characters. What more could you ask for? Oh wait, quantum physics, a killer soundtrack and goosebumps all over. You won't be disappointed.
Klasse kommt nich an die Atmosphere von Teil 1 ist aber verdammt nah dran!
A wonderful, beautiful game. So funny and so so violent. Just go buy it and have hours and hours of fun!!

Best game ever made!
The story line, Graphics and Char are amazing.
A Masterpiece !
10/10 Would Play again!
Everyone needs to play this.

It was truly a breathtaking and an astonishing experience playing and finishing this game and I enjoyed every bit of it. 

The story of the game is indeed the most thoroughly planned and initiated story I have so far seen in any game I have played and it has these amazing elements in it. It is amazing and it is put together really well.

Once you finish the game you might notice that you feel that some things are missing, and that there was something really strange that just happened. By doing some logical puzzling and putting the whole puzzle of a story together it all makes sense, although in a very strange way. I myself have managed to put the puzzle together after some thinking and crunching, but I'm not going to spoil it for you; it would just spoil the game. :) Enjoy!

Unfo tilas arvostelun niin tässä tulee: 
Toi 95 score nyt on läppä, mut on se hyvä. Siinä missä Rapturea ei nähty loistossaan, Columbia elää ja hengittää ja se on pelaaja, joka niiden utopian pistää paskaksi. Heittämällä kaunein peli mitä on nähnyt. Kauneuteen liittyy myös totaalinen bugivapaus, ts immersio ei kärsi koskaan npc:n jumittaessa juoksemassa päin seinää tms vakiokamaa. Mukana kulkeva seuralainen on toimiva - se ei osallistu taisteluun, auttaa sopivasti ja sun ei tarvitse murehtia sen terveydestä. Ja: kiihkouskovaisten rasistien lahtaaminen nyt vaan on hauskaa, outoa oikeastaan, ettei teemaa ole juurikaan hyödynnetty aikaisemmin.

Paskaa taas on vahvasti retro pelaamistyyli - mikäli tota pelaa normi fps:nä. Mä en esimerkiksi muista käyttäneeni kyykkäämistä ollenkaan, koska sniikkaus ei toimi ikinä. Putket ovat kapeat, ammunta hoidetaan rambomaisen suoraselkäisesti ja healthbar on tehnyt comebackin. Taistelun jujuna toimivat ilmakiskot ovat hauskoja ja tuovat mättöön tuoreutta, silloin kun niitä on. Taiat ovat sekä toimivia että osa niistä jopa kiinnostavia - "lähetä raivohullut korpit nokkimaan vihollinen hengiltä" on paljon kiehtovampi kuin joku tulipallo :) 

Sen verran kivaa toi mättäminen on, että vaikka juonen on jo nähnyt, aloitin uusintakierroksen - läpivedon jälkeen avautuva "1999 mode" pistää vaikeuskurvin niin korkealle, että toi ramboilu ei enää taistelussa toimikaan vaan  normivihollinenkin nirhaa ilman lennossa tehtävää suunnittelua ja improvisointia, which is nice.
